mbo_schema.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mba_group" SCHEMA_ID="mba_group"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT short_name, code FROM mba_group " ROWSTAG="mba_groups" ROWTAG="mba_group"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mbo_schema" SCHEMA_ID="mbo_schema"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT id_periodicity ,id_receiver ,full_name,template,code,query_after FROM mbo_schema " ROWSTAG="mbo_schems" ROWTAG="mbo_schema"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mb_form" SCHEMA_ID="mb_form"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT mb_object.sysname ,mb_form.code,mb_form.short_name,mb_form.content FROM mb_form join mb_object on mb_form.id_object=mb_object.id_object where mb_object.sysname like 'mb%' " ROWSTAG="mb_forms" ROWTAG="mb_form"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mb_form" SCHEMA_ID="mb_form"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT mb_object.sysname ,mb_form.code,mb_form.short_name,mb_form.content FROM mb_form join mb_object on mb_form.id_object=mb_object.id_object where Not (mb_object.sysname like 'mb%') " ROWSTAG="mb_forms" ROWTAG="mb_form"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

mbo_schema.full_name: Привязка форм ввода метабазы к представлениям
mbo_schema.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mb_link_form_object" SCHEMA_ID="mb_link_form_object"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT mb_object.sysname, mb_form.code as code_form FROM mb_link_form_object join mb_form on mb_link_form_object.id_form = mb_form.id_form join mb_object as o on mb_form.id_object=o.id_object join mb_object on mb_link_form_object.id_object = mb_object.id_object where o.sysname like 'mb%' " ROWSTAG="mb_link_form_objects" ROWTAG="mb_link_form_object"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

mbo_schema.full_name: Привязка форм ввода приложения к представлениям
mbo_schema.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mb_link_form_object" SCHEMA_ID="mb_link_form_object"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT mb_object.sysname, mb_form.code as code_form FROM mb_link_form_object join mb_form on mb_link_form_object.id_form = mb_form.id_form join mb_object as o on mb_form.id_object=o.id_object join mb_object on mb_link_form_object.id_object = mb_object.id_object where not (o.sysname like 'mb%') " ROWSTAG="mb_link_form_objects" ROWTAG="mb_link_form_object"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

mbo_schema.full_name: Права доступа к пунктам системного меню
mbo_schema.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mba_grant_task" SCHEMA_ID="grant_task"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT mba_group.code AS code_group, mb_task.code AS code_task FROM mba_grant_task, mb_task, mba_group WHERE mba_grant_task.id_task = mb_task.id_task AND mba_grant_task.id_group = mba_group.id_group and mb_task.is_sys=1 " ROWSTAG="grant_tasks" ROWTAG="grant_task"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

mbo_schema.full_name: Права доступа к пунктам меню приложения
mbo_schema.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mba_grant_task" SCHEMA_ID="grant_task"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT mba_group.code AS code_group, mb_task.code AS code_task FROM mba_grant_task, mb_task, mba_group WHERE mba_grant_task.id_task = mb_task.id_task AND mba_grant_task.id_group = mba_group.id_group and mb_task.is_sys=0 " ROWSTAG="grant_tasks" ROWTAG="grant_task"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mbg_diagram_template" SCHEMA_ID="mbg_diagram_template"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT description, contents, code, code_help FROM mbg_diagram_template" ROWSTAG="mbg_diagram_templates" ROWTAG="mbg_diagram_template"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mbr_report" SCHEMA_ID="mbr_report"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT short_name, code, is_visible, is_single_object, code_help, contents, full_name FROM mbr_report" ROWSTAG="mbr_reports" ROWTAG="mbr_report"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <QUERYDATA XMLDATATAG="XMLDATA" sysname="mbr_report_template" SCHEMA_ID="mbr_report_template"> <XMLHEADER> <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>]]> </XMLHEADER> <COMMENT> <![CDATA[]]> </COMMENT> <QUERY SQLTEXT = "SELECT id_report_template ,description ,contents ,code ,code_help FROM mbr_report_template" ROWSTAG="mbr_report_templates" ROWTAG="mbr_report_template"> </QUERY> </QUERYDATA>
